data.title: Tom Berenger Filmography, List of Tom Berenger Movies and TV Shows
data.meta_description: Films starring Tom Berenger. Also features Tom Berenger TV shows. Latest movies featuring Tom Berenger. Tom Berenger DVDs. The list includes TV series, TV movies, short films and movie appearances. The filmography list includes the title, the title's year of release, and the character played by Tom Berenger, where applicable.
data.text:
